entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High 17. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Clearing before morning. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight then light overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
